solution_line_template: First find the total time Carla spends peeling vegetables: {sharpening_time} minutes * {peeling_multiplier} = <<{sharpening_time}*{peeling_multiplier}={peeling_time}>>{peeling_time} minutes
Then add the time she spent sharpening her knife: {peeling_time} minutes + {sharpening_time} minutes = <<{peeling_time}+{sharpening_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
